channel.title: rust on GuHong Min
channel.description: Recent content in rust on GuHong Min

item.title: [Rust] Rust Basics
item.description: C1. Getting Started 1.1. Hello, world! Writing code in rust and compiling with bash (WSL env) // filename: main.rs // `!` is an indication of macro // entry point of Rust code is `main`, akin to c-type langs fn main(){ println!("Hello, world!"); } $ rustc main.rs $ ./main.rs
